TEXT.S: David Andrews kawas tay 195, David Andrews, squliq na Bunge'. qnxan na sraral 1952 kawas 11 byacing 2 ryax, Andrews htgan beh Baton Rouge Louisiana.mqwas beh Louisiana krahu' pqwasan biru.1970 kawas tmasoq pqwasan biru. pincyogan nya David Andrews ga mhtuw te qutux ega,1984 kawas ngungu ega Nightmare on Elm Street . 1987 kawas, BBC na Pulaski. 1990 kawas mhtuw Stephen King's Graveyard Shift. hiya pincyogan nya Mann Machine blaq . 1995 kawas,David Andrews mhtuw Pete Conrad. 1998 kawas,mhtuw Earth to the Moon . 2001 kawas, mhtuw Band of Brothers. Andrews mhtuw Fight Club. 2000 kawas,mhtuw Navigating the Heart.suruw lga,mhtuw Silence of the Lambs.
